title: Quincey Morris, Vampire
description: Texan adventurer Quincey Morris managed to kill the famous Dracula, prince among vampires, at the cost of his own life. But that wasn't the end: now Quincey is a vampire And Dracula's old enemy, Professor Van Helsing, has managed to convince Quincey's friends that the only good vampire -- even if he's a former comrade -- is a dead one. . . .
author: P.N. Elrod
